alert.note: Alert for Luce; Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:30PM EDT until August 03 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Luce County in eastern Upper Michigan... Northeastern Schoolcraft County in east central Upper Michigan... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 529 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near M-28 between Shingleton and Seney, or 12 miles southeast of Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees possible. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... M-28 between Shingleton and Seney around 535 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Seney and Germfask. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
